BBEX3.M.UAH.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in the Ukraine / EUR 100 = UAH ... (middle)
Source: National Bank of Ukraine, Kyiv

Comment on 2014-02: In February 2014, the hryvnia ceased to be pegged to the US dollar and the value of the hryvnia consequently fell significantly. In light of the high capital outflows, initial capital controls were introduced on 7 February 2014.
